attributes.action: Let every mother to be have a 20 week Anomaly Scan anywhere in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Anomaly Scans determine certain illnesses and disabilities in an unborn baby in the womb..These scans cover important factors in an unborn baby.
Anencephaly, Exomphalos/gastroscisis,
Major limb abnormalities,Spina bifida,
Major kidney problems,Diaphragmatic hernia,Hydrocephalus,Down's syndrome and Heart problems.
If there is a problem and it is serious, you will be given the opportunity to discuss all your options, which may include termination of the pregnancy, surgery or treatment after birth, or even surgery in the womb. You will be supported by the team, which may include midwives, obstetricians, paediatricians, physiotherapists and the hospital chaplain. 
Are these issues not important enough for the NHS? Why should we not have this scan? 
Please support my petition.Due to cuts and funding the system is in a mess and leaves us parents to be in a place we would rather not be.
